title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Engineering
description: I am studying a B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering at the National University. On my educational journey, I always try to make a strong foundation in computer science, algorithms, and database management.

title: HSC
description: I completed my Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) from the Science group, where I focused on subjects like Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics. This foundation helped me develop strong analytical and problem-solving skills that guided my path toward computer science.

title: SSC
institution: Motijheel Model High School And College
description: I completed my Secondary School Certificate (SSC) in the Science group, gaining knowledge in core science and mathematics subjects. This stage of education built my logical thinking and curiosity for technology, which later inspired me to pursue higher studies in engineering.
